attributes.action: Stop a long extension to brexit
attributes.additional_details: In 2016 I’m s referendum the uk decided by a majority to leave the EU, both government and opposition party agreed in there manifestos to honour it, we as a country cannot keep putting this off and asking for extension after extension there has to be a end point if government and opposition cannot agree then the default leave without a deal must be honoured, we ask that no further delay be made, it is up to government and opposition to honour the referendum as the PM has said repeatedly.
attributes.background: The people of the uk in 2016 voted to leave the EU there was no mention of trade deals it was a strait forward question to leave or not the majority voted to leave and the government accepted this both the government and opposition voted for article 50 to be triggered it is now time to forfill that.
